items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: All Season
items.description: Most common: Good handle on dry, wet or snow

items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

items.title: Highway
items.description: Highway terrain tires are commonly used on light trucks and SUVs that typically haul materials or need to conquer highways and some off-road terrains.

items.title: All Weather
items.description: Combines an All Season and Winter tire traits for strong traction year-round

items.title: Winter
items.description: For snow, ice, and freezing temperatures

header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 285-60r20 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA
Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 285-60r20 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 285/60R20 Tire Size
The 285/60R20 tire size is exclusive to RAM 2500 and 3500 trucks, and typically rolls out of the factory with a set of [Firestone Transforce AT](https://simpletire.com/brands/firestone-transforce-at) tires attached. The RAM 2500 and 3500 are larger trucks that can be used in regular and work applications, and these trucks sometimes go off-road for work or for fun, so they need a set of tires that can conquer any terrain.

Drivers who spend a lot of time off-road need to make sure their tires are durable and able to handle difficult terrains. Mud terrain tires are a great choice for drivers who spend a lot of time off-road, and tires like the Toyo Open Country M/T, [Nitto Trail Grappler M/T](https://simpletire.com/brands/nitto-tires/trail-grappler-m-t), and Fierce Attitude M/T feature an aggressive tread pattern and reinforced casing for excellent traction and durability when driving off-road.

Maybe you only do some off-road driving, so you don’t need something as aggressive as a mud terrain tire. Fortunately, all-terrain tires are engineered to provide great off-road traction without sacrificing on-road performance. Consider the [Falken Wildpeak A/T3W](https://simpletire.com/brands/falken-tires/wildpeak-a-t3w), Hankook Dynapro AT2 Xtreme (RF12), and BFGoodrich All-Terrain T/A KO2 if you need a set of 285/60R20 tires that performs on- and off-road.

Driving a RAM 2500 or 3500 doesn’t mean you have to drive off-road, so drivers who spend all of their time on paved roads need to make sure their tires are built to handle, dry, wet, and winter weather conditions. All-season tires are the most commonly used tires thanks to their ability to perform year-round, so check out the [Michelin Defender LTX M/S](https://simpletire.com/brands/michelin-tires/defender-ltx-m-s), Continental TerrainContact H/T, and Toyo Open Country H/T II if you need a set of 285/60R20 tires that performs year-round.

Whether you need a set of mud terrain, all-terrain, all-season, or another type of tire for your RAM 2500 or 3500, SimpleTire has a set of 285/60R20 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
